app.title: FinRag'as

chat.title: FinRag'as

chat.initialMessage: Hello! I am a large language model, trained by Google. My main function is to help you resolve disputes between clients and insurance companies, based on the documents of disputes resolved by the **Bank of Lithuania**. How can I help you?
